label: 大仏殿
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: The Great Buddha Hall of Tōdaiji was constructed under Emperor Shōmu and completed in 751. It houses the Great Buddha of Nara, Vairocana (J: Rushana), and was the venue for the Kaigen-e, the Consecration Ceremony of the Great Buddha, on the ninth day of the fourth month of 752. [東大寺、聖武天皇、盧舎那、開眼会]
